metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14934 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in PDFResurrect before 0.18. pdf_load_pages_kids inpdf.c doesn't validate a certain size value, which leads to a mallocfailure and out-of-bounds write.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14934` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.18-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18-2').
